item: Hotkeys:
Press 'H' to access the help. (This screen)
Travel the cave and kill they creatures.
Player Movement: (right handed - left handed see below)
Press 'A' to move left.
Press 'D' to move right.
Press 'W' to move up.
Press 'S' to move down.
Press left arrow to move crosshairs clockwise.
Press right arrow to move crosshairs counter clockwise
Press up arrow to fire weapon.
Mouse Movement:
The crosshairs will follow the mouse.
Right click to fire the gun.
Clear the map to get mods and upgrades.
Player Movement: (left handed)
Press left arrow to move left.
Press right arrow to move right.
Press up arrow to move up.
Press dow arrow to move down.
Press 'A' to move crosshairs clockwise.
Press 'D' to move crosshairs counter clockwise
Press 'W' to fire weapon.
Mouse Movement:
The crosshairs will follow the mouse.
Right click to fire the gun.
